Title: Relates to including if a person has autism spectrum disorder on his or her driver's license; repealer
Summary: Includes a distinctive mark on a person's driver's license if a person has autism spectrum disorder.
LawCode: Amd §§490 & 504, rpld & add §502 sub 1, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to including if a person has autism spectrum disorder on his or her driver's license; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
